short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that fills your new tab with usefull widgets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zi Tab is a free Chrome extension designed to enhance your new tab experience.

Introducing Zi Tab – your personalized new tab:

Time, Date, and Calendar: customizable to gregorian and shamsi date options.
Background Customization: Choose from our selection of background images, colors and gradients or upload your own.
Notes: Save notes instantly across your desktop browser through different devices.
Shortcuts and Links: Access your favorites easily and categorize them through folders.
Weather Updates: Stay informed with local weather by selecting your city.
Language Options: Choose between English and Persian.
Ad-Free: Zi Tab is ad-free as its users are our friends!

Transform your browsing with Zi Tab – efficient, customizable, and stylish.
